name: guard-dog

effect.scarlet-violet: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
effect.the-teal-mask: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.

short_effect: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.
